co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce

Interface MapReduceContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DatasetContext, RuntimeContext, ServiceDiscoverer

    public interface MapReduceContext
extends RuntimeContext, DatasetContext, ServiceDiscoverer
    MapReduce job execution context.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getHadoopJob() 
      long getLogicalStartTime()
      Returns the logical start time of this MapReduce job.
      MapReduceSpecification getSpecification() 
      void setInput(String datasetName, List<Split> splits)
      Overrides the input configuration of this MapReduce job to use the specified dataset by its name and data selection splits.
      void setOutput(String datasetName)
      Overrides the output configuration of this MapReduce job to write to the specified dataset by its name.

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.RuntimeContext

        getRuntimeArguments

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.data.DatasetContext

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.ServiceDiscoverer

    • Method Detail

      • getSpecification

        MapReduceSpecification getSpecification()
        Returns:
        The specification used to configure this MapReduce job instance.

      • getLogicalStartTime

        long getLogicalStartTime()
        Returns the logical start time of this MapReduce job. Logical start time is the time when this MapReduce job is supposed to start if this job is started by the scheduler. Otherwise it would be the current time when the job runs.
        Returns:
        Time in milliseconds since epoch time (00:00:00 January 1, 1970 UTC).

      • getHadoopJob

        <T> T getHadoopJob()

      • setInput

        void setInput(String datasetName,
            List<Split> splits)
        Overrides the input configuration of this MapReduce job to use the specified dataset by its name and data selection splits.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - Name of the input dataset.
        splits - Data selection splits.

      • setOutput

        void setOutput(String datasetName)
        Overrides the output configuration of this MapReduce job to write to the specified dataset by its name.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - Name of the output dataset.
